chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 has the above problem:
The charging port seems to be faulty, as it does not recognize Apple's original cables and cannot charge. All cables work perfectly fine with other Apple devices.

Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we have insufficient stocks available for an exchange. Instead we have fully refunded the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
